title: Tests related to debuginfo-both failing on sparc64

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

body:
During the past releases, a lot of bugs in the sparc64 backend have been fixed so that we're down to 59 failing tests now.

One of the tests that have been failing for a long time now (don't know whether they ever passed) are ```debuginfo-both```:

```
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/borrowed-basic.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/borrowed-c-style-enum.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/borrowed-enum.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/destructured-local.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/evec-in-struct.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/extern-c-fn.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/function-call.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/gdb-pretty-struct-and-enums.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/generic-enum-with-different-disr-sizes.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/generic-struct-style-enum.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/generic-struct.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/generic-tuple-style-enum.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/include_string.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-in-for-loop.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-in-if.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-in-match.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-in-stack-closure.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-in-unconditional-loop.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-in-unique-closure.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-in-while.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/lexical-scope-with-macro.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/multiple-functions-equal-var-names.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/multiple-functions.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/name-shadowing-and-scope-nesting.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/shadowed-argument.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/shadowed-variable.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/simd.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/simple-lexical-scope.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/struct-style-enum.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/tuple-in-struct.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/tuple-in-tuple.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/tuple-struct.rs ... FAILED
test [debuginfo-both] debuginfo/tuple-style-enum.rs ... FAILED
command did not execute successfully: "/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/build/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-tools-bin/compiletest" "--compile-lib-path" "/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/build/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib" "--run-lib-path" "/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/build/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/rustlib/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "--rustc-path" "/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/build/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustc" "--src-base" "/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/src/test/debuginfo" "--build-base" "/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/build/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/debuginfo" "--stage-id" "stage2-sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu" "--mode" "debuginfo-both" "--target" "sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu" "--host" "sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu" "--llvm-filecheck" "/usr/lib/llvm-8/bin/FileCheck" "--linker" "sparc64-linux-gnu-gcc" "--host-rustcflags" "-Crpath -O -Zunstable-options  -Lnative=/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/build/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/native/rust-test-helpers" "--target-rustcflags" "-Crpath -O -Zunstable-options  -Lnative=/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>/build/sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu/native/rust-test-helpers" "--docck-python" "/usr/bin/python2.7" "--lldb-python" "/usr/bin/python2.7" "--gdb" "/usr/bin/gdb" "--verbose" "--llvm-version" "8.0.1\n" "--system-llvm" "--cc" "" "--cxx" "" "--cflags" "" "--llvm-components" "" "--llvm-cxxflags" "" "--adb-path" "adb" "--adb-test-dir" "/data/tmp/work" "--android-cross-path" ""
```

https://buildd.debian.org/status/fetch.php?pkg=rustc&arch=sparc64&ver=1.36.0%2Bdfsg1-2&stamp=1563429749&raw=0

My suspicion would be that we are missing some code for debug support on sparc64 but I have no clue.

@jrtc27 @psumbera @karcherm
